div.h2: US Core Vaccine National Drug Codes (NDC)

div.p: This value set includes all the Vaccine National Drug Codes (NDC). This source of this data is provided by the CDC
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/ndc

title.value: US Core Vaccine National Drug Codes (NDC)

description.value: This value set includes all the Vaccine National Drug Codes (NDC). This source of this data is provided by the [CDC](https://www2a.cdc.gov/vaccines/iis/iisstandards/ndc_crosswalk.asp)

purpose.value: Codes that are used as translations for CVS code for implementation of the Argonaut Immunization IG and MU2015 certification.
